description: Current System Security Plan (SSP) document with all completed sections including system information, authorization details, and approval signatures
Access control policy and procedures documentation (AC-1)
List of all user accounts (privileged and non-privileged) with assigned roles, permissions, and account types
Account management procedures including account creation, modification, and termination workflows (AC-2)
Evidence of monthly privileged account reviews and semi-annual non-privileged account reviews (AC-2(j))
Automated account management system configuration and audit logs (AC-2(1), AC-2(4))
Documentation of temporary and emergency account policies with evidence of automatic disablement within 24 hours (AC-2(2), AC-2(3))
Separation of duties matrix showing role assignments and conflicting duties (AC-5)
Role-based access control (RBAC) or attribute-based access control (ABAC) implementation documentation (AC-6, AC-2(7))
Evidence of annual privileged user access reviews (AC-6(7))
Audit logs demonstrating privileged function execution logging (AC-6(9))
Account lockout configuration showing failed logon attempt thresholds and lockout duration (AC-7)
System use notification banner text and implementation evidence (AC-8)
Session timeout and device lock configuration set to 15 minutes of inactivity (AC-11, AC-12)
Concurrent session limits configuration (3 for privileged, 2 for non-privileged) (AC-10)
Remote access policy and procedures including VPN configuration and usage restrictions (AC-17)
Remote access monitoring logs and encryption implementation evidence (AC-17(1), AC-17(2))
Wireless access policy, authentication mechanisms, and encryption standards (AC-18, AC-18(1))
Mobile device management (MDM) policy and configuration requirements (AC-19)
Mobile device encryption implementation evidence (full-device or container-based) (AC-19(5))
External system usage policy and approved connection agreements (AC-20, AC-20(1))
Information sharing agreements and data classification guidelines (AC-21)
Publicly accessible content review procedures and quarterly review logs (AC-22)
Information flow control policy and enforcement mechanisms (AC-4)
Intrusion detection system (IDS) configuration for encrypted traffic inspection (AC-4(4))
Network architecture diagrams showing logical and physical separation of information flows (AC-4(21))
List of functions and information accessible without authentication with documented justification (AC-14)
Services, ports, and protocols inventory with purpose and authorized users
FedRAMP authorization package ID and current authorization status
FIPS 199 security categorization documentation (SSP Appendix K)
Digital Identity Level (DIL) determination documentation (SSP Appendix E)
System owner and ISSO contact information and role assignments
FedRAMP-authorized cloud service provider (CSP) and cloud service offering (CSO) dependencies list
Non-FedRAMP external system connections inventory with risk assessments
Security awareness and training records for personnel with access control responsibilities (AT family)
